name: THE HARDEST GAME (you ever played) LITE
name_original: THE HARDEST GAME (you ever played) LITE
description:
THE HARDEST GAME (you ever played) is here now! LITE Version.

We think that this is the most addictive game ever created for the iPhone.
It is easy at first, but with every sequence it gets harder and harder, until it reaches a time when
you think it is impossible to beat the game!

LITE version goes up to 15 sequences. (still will be hard to achieve this for a casual gamer).

You will need a lot of practice to complete the whole game on each of the game modes.
Reflex, patience and some luck is required if you want to be the master of this game!

There are 3 difficulty modes in this game: Just Hard, Harder, Hardest.
Each difficulty mode is harder then the other because of the difficulty modes design.

There is a animated Instructions screen if you need help understanding the game design.

Ofcourse for each of the modes there is a Top High Scores available, so you know just how good you
are, and can compare the scores with your friends that also have THE HARDEST GAME.

GAME RULES:
- Tilt your iPhone/iPod (hold it flat to the floor) to move the Square Indicator.
- Complete the sequences by touching the numbered boxes in a correct order (from 1 to ... upper numbers).
- When you complete each sequence a new numbered box is added to game screen and the sequence is longer.

Challenge yourself and your friends with this great game!
